1610682330_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body:
P2P computer without SSD storage = issue, unless you are doing parallel reads from multiple spinning drives (noisy, a bit more electricity).
I am currently thinking about getting 2x8TB SSD Samsung QVO and adding these to Raid 0 (combined 14TB around). Overpriced, but i do not want to wait 2 years and polute my environment by several HDDs noise... :-/ (not yet found time to research and come with some really good sound dampening solution, that would at same time allow airflow/cooling)
Another solution is to rent the server, quite easy and no noise + possibly more privacy and less bandwidth from home. @styromaniac
